title: You can get chat ban over 1 game now?
body:
I'm a big fan of the "/mute all" feature. 90% of my games as soon as someone starts getting toxic I just hit it. 

I got on today and had a pretty crappy day, so in my first game of the day when my jungler fed my lane doubles at 3 minutes I was a little ticked but said nothing at first, jungle flames me for not calling mia I tell him i did and to listen to my 'f^^^ing pings'. I die to the laner who now had doubles, jungle calls me bad, i call him bad, yadda yadda some more back and forth like that making quips at eachother nothing crazy. A minute later I hit the "/mute all" get my head in the game start coming back. (playing nasus just stacking hard). So I'm making good rotations now helping my team were coming back it's all great when I go top to stack another fat wave I set up to stack up some more. The ADC decided those were her minions now, I was sitting there hitting them 1 at a time for max stacks and up rolls jinx, while Im furiously pinging her back, with hurricane sharks to steal the whole 5-6 waves from me. unmuted everyone. I tell her to "Go F^^^ herself" tell the team to stop fucking me over yadda yadda. Turns out she had me muted as well and just thought it was fine to not let me stack anymore. 

At the end of the game I felt bad about how toxic that game was and I mentally told myself I needed to hit that "/mute all" earlier next game. 

Next game rolls up and I'm chat banned. 

I'm in no way saying that I wasn't toxic that game. But does Riot really expect every player to be 100% non-toxic every single game? People arn't allowed to have a bad day here without getting punished? 

I was probably toxic for like 5 minutes in the beginning of that game and 3 minutes near the end, I re-muted everyone again and we pulled the game out and won.

The system punishes based on consistency x severity. Meaning you can be punished with 1 severe toxicity game, or you can be punished with 100 games of minor toxicity. 

You weren't punished for 1 game alone. The reform card only shows you 1-5 **recent games as examples** of unacceptable behavior. It won't show on the reform card if it's passed the "recent" period. 

If you want to know how many games you were validly reported in, you can send in a ticket to https://support.riotgames.com

This makes sense, if this the case, why wouldn't riot tell you when you've been validly reported?

Like what is considered minor toxicity?

I play this game primarily, so that recent period would have to be less than 24 hours if I'm toxic in most games.

> Like what is considered minor toxicity?

* Report calling / threatening
* Defeatist attitude - e.g "gg I'm done, gonna AFK farm and ff@15"
* Shaming
 * Skill - stfu noob
 * KDA - You 0/7, so stfu
 * Age - stfu kid
 * Rank - stfu you bronze

There's probably some more, but those are just general guidelines.

> 
> I play this game primarily, so that recent period would have to be less than 24 hours if I'm toxic in most games.

It'll also depend on whether people report you. No report = people thought it was fine. So it is possible for one game you are deemed toxic and the other game with same behavior, you aren't toxic (cos you weren't reported for it).
